event.title: Highest temperature in Chicago on Aug 24, 2024?

markets.subtitle: 85° or below
markets.rules_primary: If the highest temperature recorded at Chicago Midway, IL for August 24, 2024, is less than 86° according to the NWS's Daily Climate Report, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary:
Please be advised to check to see what temperatures have occurred previously in the day. While the market resolves based on the finalized report from the NWS, traders should use other data sources--including other preliminary NWS reporting--to inform their trades.

The Last Trading Time will be 11:59 PM ET on August 24, 2024 regardless of any data releases or events occurring. Expiration will occur on the sooner of the first 10:00 AM following the release of the data for August 24, 2024, or one week after August 24, 2024.

As a reminder, the Underlying is not the NWS NOWData data source. As noted in the Rulebook, for the actual Underlying, please go to the Source Agency link, click on "Observed Weather", then choose "Chicago Midway, IL".
